content: the 2x2 check pattern after removing the thumb stitches move your bor marker up to row 17 the charts bear no relation to gauge knit thumb slip the 11 thumb stitches on hold onto a dpn pick up and knit 5 stitches in correct colour sequence over the thumb gap 1 in the corner 3 across the top and 1 in the second corner 16 sts divide these sts evenly on the three dpns place a marker on the first stitch of the held stitches for the bor and knit 12 row in 1x1 check pattern nr cut light colour leaving a 4 tail and tuck it inside the thumb k2tog in dark to eor 8 sts cut the dark yarn leaving a 4 tail close turn mitten inside out and weave in all ends ta da happy mitting details of thumb gussets and picked-up stitches for the thumb look ma no holes
